creator: Book of the Month
descriptionHtml:
Top-shelf reads are now at your fingertips. With the BOTM app you can now view monthly picks, choose your book, track your BFF progress, and so much more.

• Be the first to see our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books, if you know what we mean).
• Access your account and track BFF progress.
• Rate and review the books you’ve read.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Refer a friend to join and earn free book credits when they do.

Pumped? So are we. And we’re just getting started. More features are coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Great reads found here.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Bug fixes:
* Fixed a bug that was causing the app to reload when a members shipped their 12th box to become a BFF.

Improvements:
* You can now share your book of the month with your friends from the shipment confirmation pop up. Get a free credit when they join.
* Clicking on links for our site will now direct you to our app if you have it downloaded.

title: Book of the Month

creator: Book of the Month
descriptionHtml:
Treat your shelf to new hardcover books monthly. With the Book of the Month app, you can now view top picks, choose your book, track your reading progress, and so much more.

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS
• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Discover new books, choose your monthly picks, and track your reading progress.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're getting a jump on our spring cleaning & making way for the March books!

Bugs
* Fixed a possible display issue when enrolling with a book
* Fixed a display issue on the monthly books' mini-nav

title: Book of the Month

creator: Book of the Month
descriptionHtml:
Treat your shelf to new hardcover books monthly. With the Book of the Month app, you can now view top picks, choose your book, track your reading progress, and so much more.

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS
• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Discover new books, choose your monthly picks, and track your reading progress.

• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Discover new books, choose your monthly picks, and track your reading progress.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update addresses several issues. Please update today for the best experience.

• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Discover new books, choose your monthly picks, and track your reading progress.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This update includes several behind-the-scenes bug fixes and improvements. Be sure to update today for the best experience.

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
descriptionShort: Discover new books, choose your monthly picks, and track your reading progress.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update includes several behind-the-scenes bug fixes and improvements. Be sure to update today for the best experience!

Bug fixes
* We fixed a copy issue that could appear when redeeming a free book offer.
* The Book Boss badge now shows the correct color.

title: Book of the Month

creator: Book of the Month
descriptionHtml:
Treat your shelf to new hardcover books monthly. With the Book of the Month app, you can now view top picks, choose your book, track your reading progress, and so much more.

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS
• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.

Treat your shelf to new hardcover books monthly. With the Book of the Month app, you can now view top picks, choose your book, track your reading progress, and so much more.

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS
• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.

• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

descriptionHtml:
Treat your shelf to new hardcover books monthly. With the Book of the Month app, you can now view top picks, choose your book, track your reading progress, and so much more.

DISCOVER NEW BOOKS
• Get the first look at our monthly picks.
• Choose your book (or books — we know it's hard to pick just one). 😅
• Explore debut authors and early release books.
• Vote on the BOTY finalists.

TRACK YOUR PROGRESS
• Log the books you want to read with your To Be Read list.
• Share book reviews and see what your fellow readers loved.
• Participate in our in-app reading challenge to earn prizes.
• Unlock BFF rewards once you get your 12th box. 🏆

STAY IN THE LOOP
• Manage your subscription.
• View your book shipments.
• Refer friends and earn free book credits when they join.
• Shop our Blue Box Boutique and gifting options. 🎁

Think that's all? Reader, it is not. We’re just getting started. More features coming soon!

title:
Book of the Month
6.6.0

creator: Book of the Month
descriptionHtml:
Every month, we bring you a shortlist of the best new fiction we’ve come across, with a mix of books likely to be in your sweet spot as well as intriguing
outliers. You pick what speaks to you, we send it your way. We’ll see you again in four weeks. Happy reading :)

More than just books:
Get access to app exclusive content like reviewing the books you’re loving, tracking your path to rewards, and crushing digital challenges (for IRL prizes).

Read with your ears:
Fit curated audiobooks from every genre into your commute, errands, trips, chores, and relaxation.

We make big breaks happen:
We’re committed to celebrating and championing emerging authors. Listen to our authors on our podcast, Virtual Book Tour.

This app was designed and developed in-house by Book of the Month in New York, NY.
